name: Iron Sword
description: A basic weapon forged from iron, the iron sword is sturdy and reliable. Its blade, though plain, holds a keen edge, suitable for cutting through soft materials and parrying weaker attacks.

name: Iron Ring
description: This simple iron ring is unadorned, yet its craftsmanship speaks of durability and strength. It's a modest accessory, but its solid construction suggests it will endure the test of time.
